body.name: Renpure Plant Based Coconut and Vitamin E Moisturize and Replenish Conditioner - Ideal for Dry, Lifeless Hair - Leaves Hair Silky and Smooth - Paraben Free - Recyclable, Pump Bottle Design - 24 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 37 mins
features: RESTORE YOUR NATURAL SHINE. Give life to your tresses with this conditioner and experience superior shine and bounce that will turn heads. This product has been formulated to help boost overall hair growth while remaining gentle from roots to ends.

PERFECT SHAMPOO PARTNER. You don't have to begin and end your wash day with only shampoo. Our conditioner gives you the extra boost you need for healthier hair. Indulge in full on moisture, a light touch of hydration and all that good stuff in between.

TREAT YOUR HAIR RIGHT. This Vitamin E conditioner has the ability to transform your tresses, starting from the scalp. Upgrade your hair care line with our unique products and enjoy less dryness and itching, increased volume or enhanced moisture.

SAFE FROM CHEMICALS NOT COMPLIMENTS. Renpure replaces harmful ingredients with equally effective clean alternatives so our formulas are gentle on loved ones and the environment. We believe that anything a chemical can do a plant can do better.

A BRAND WITH A PURPOSE. Renpure delivers naturally inspired, plant-based products created for the whole family. We believe that everyone deserves safer, quality products, wrapped in indulgent experiences and delicious scents without compromise.
body.description: Renpure Plant Based Coconut and Vitamin E Moisturize and Replenish Conditioner is crafted to moisturize and nourish dry, lifeless hair, leaving it feeling silky and smooth. At Renpure, our naturally derived shampoos and conditioners bring your hair to life without the use of harmful ingredients, while caring for our planet. Our pump and bottle are both 100% recyclable and made from post consumer recycled plastic, making sustainable choices easier.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #14,346 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #347 in Hair Conditioner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plant-Based Collection The evolution of naturally inspired formulas! We are on the journey to evolve our formulas to be gentle on loved ones and the environment. Our Plant-Based collection offers more than 80% plant source ingredients along with good-for-you ingredients that help minimize the damage to our environment and your hair. We believe whatever a chemical can do, a plant can do better.

About Renpure We believe that whatever a chemical can do, a plant can do better. Renpure delivers gently-sourced ingredients that never promises performance. Naturally inspired products does not mean sacrificing performance. Replacing harmful ingredients with equally effective clean alternatives is what inspires us. Safe, affordable and effective products for the family that stays within budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the way it makes my hair smell and feel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and hydrated
reviews.reviewText: Overall my hair keeps the moisture in. I’m very happy with the product and will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a good hair conditioner. It smell like grapefruit. Not crazy about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: THIS IS THE GOOD STUFFMy hair loves it and its the only kind that doesn't agitate my sensitive scalp. Hoghly reccomend. Great trustworthy brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It smells good, but it doesn’t moisturize curly hair very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the color wheel
reviews.reviewText: I use this product because it contains no sulfur products, which cause yellowing. Also the sunlight causes oxidation of the sebaceous oil and responsible for most yellowing. Alternating between this and Renpure's Green Tea shampoo takes care of this problem without using purple organic alcohols to mask the yellow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My kids constantly sniff my hair when they hug me and tell me my hair smells amazing. I have slightly textured curly hair and the stuff has been helping rehydrate my hair wonderfully. I love to use this as a co-wash in between my washes to help keep my hair from drying out. I've been using this shampoo and conditioner for years I have alopecia as well and I feel like this is just been such a game changer in my hair routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars New formula and fragrance (not good)
reviews.reviewText: Really wish they would go back to the old formula. The new stuff smells like synthetic perfume and it’s nothing like the formula they were using last year. Gives me a headache. Very disappointing. Don’t get the yellow bottle (coconut used to be in the yellow bottle and be VERY careful not to order there new yellow bottle expecting the same awesome old coconut scent, it’s absolutely terrible, synthetic and migraine inducing). Why?!

reviews.reviewTitle: Humecta bastante, es para cabello super seco.
reviews.reviewText: Humecta mucho, al grado de quedar algunas partes de la cabellera aplastadas. Para cabellos gruesos y secos es genial. Cabellos delgados puede que quede con residuos que no se quitan hasta en dos lavadas. Buen producto para cierto nicho.

Ya lo he usado antes y es muy bueno y huele súper rico, pero me llego mal, no se si lote defectuoso o echado a perder, no se, me quemo la espalda y la cabeza, me dio un dolor de cabeza horrible y se me cayó un montón de pelo. El acondicionador en si si lo recomiendo, solo es que me salió mal.
